mapper.sql: id, username, password, telphone, is_vip, accounttype, balance, isRealname, status, createTime, updateTime, role, email, brief, info, gender, birthday, isDel
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, password, telphone, is_vip, accounttype, balance, isRealname, status, createTime, updateTime, role, email, brief, info, gender, birthday, isDel) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdel,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update user
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
username = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{record.telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_vip = #{record.isVip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accounttype = #{record.accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
balance = #{record.balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
isRealname = #{record.isrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
role = #{record.role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brief = #{record.brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info = #{record.info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{record.gender,jdbcType=BIT},
birthday = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isDel = #{record.isdel,jdbcType=BIT},

update user set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{record.telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_vip = #{record.isVip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accounttype = #{record.accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{record.balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, isRealname = #{record.isrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, role = #{record.role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brief = #{record.brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info = #{record.info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{record.gender,jdbcType=BIT}, birthday = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isDel = #{record.isdel,jdbcType=BIT}

update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_vip = #{isVip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accounttype = #{accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
isRealname = #{isrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brief = #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isDel = #{isdel,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
